text:
*A).* Reachdesk - The connection setup is triggered on Reachdesk website, the oAuth rountrip goes to HubSpot where scopes are approved and done.

*B)* Google Sheets - This is initiated trough HubSpot, I go to Google oAuth screen, give HubSpot its permissions and then I can use Google Sheets actions



How are these setups different? Are they both available to developers? Are they both not just regular public apps?
is the ability to reply to marketplace reviews in beta? I can see some theme owners can reply to their reviews, but there is also an idea for this in the ideas community.
You can do this when you view your listing under asset marketplace tab in header nav
Then details, sales, ratings & reviews, version history. Click on ratings tab
You're welcome. Took me a while also. Tabs can be a blessing and a curse.
